description:
The long summer break is over and the second semester starts. Pirari Academy is having its first ever school festival, and Lion and her friends think about what kind of event they should do. Everyone agrees on Mahiro`s idea to do a play. Mahiro starts working on the script at once, but writing easy as she thinks...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les rêves mènent à la réussite
